Text: Jai Ho! (You Are My Destiny):  (You Are My Destiny)" is a song performed by American girl group The Pussycat Dolls for their second studio album "Doll Domination" (2008).

Text: Jai Ho! (You Are My Destiny):  After watching "Slumdog Millionaire" record executives Jimmy Iovine and Ron Fair wanted to turn "Jai Ho" into a "pop record without deviating from the original melody" and asked Scherzinger to do her own interpretation of the song.
